name: Toddler Puzzles: Kids A-Z Jigsaw Puzzle Games
name_original: Toddler Puzzles: Kids A-Z Jigsaw Puzzle Games
description:
OkiPlay is an independent family business. We create apps for parents, teachers and children all over the world - apps that your children love, and that you can trust 100%. We bring over 30 years experience in kids publishing, illustrating and programming to every app we create.

We’re members of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers promoting quality apps for kids and families.

If you’d like to know more, pop over to our website www.okiplay.com, and we'd love to hear from you at hello@okiplay.com
